description: We tricked Reece Hutton into showing the crew around his home town of Edinburgh. A cute, Scottish twink Reece was keen to show a porn film crew all the sights of the city and afterwards, eagerly accept our invitation to come back to the film set for us to show him how we make movies! Letting us strap him to the bed was stupid but once tied down it was all about lying back to enjoy the ride. Watch our crew stick dildos into this sweet fellas ass, big and big ones until, oh, out comes the blow-up dildo and Reece takes it like a man!
title: Reece Hutton & Sebastian Kane
